description:
When Minori disappears, leaving only her phone behind, Kyoko and Takashi enlist their classmates` help searching for her. When they find out what`s happened to Minori, they see the one text she never sent and take a guess at who really sent the mystery text.
Source: amazon

titles.title: After the Festival, the Morning Light
Matsuri no Ato, Asa no Hikari
